title: Marketing & Campaign Design for James Bond Look-Alike Cosplay Contest ($5,000 in 007 NFTs)
description: We’re hosting a James Bond look-alike cosplay contest, where participants compete for a $5,000 prize pool paid in exclusive 007 NFTs. We’re looking for a freelancer to design and run a marketing campaign that mixes spy-thriller flair with modern Web3 culture, driving buzz, sign-ups, and community engagement. The campaign should feel cinematic, stylish, and irresistible to both Bond fans and NFT collectors.
